participant_1.background:
I'm an artist who draws my friends as my little pony characters.
I've got a story to tell about my time in the Amazon Rainforest.
I have a crib in my office, so I can keep an eye on my child while I work.
I love spending time with my daughter and watching her grow into a smart, independent young woman.
I don't play an instrument but I enjoy listening to music, especially The Lumineers.

participant_2.background:
I like to dye my hair blue because it reminds me of the ocean.
My dad and brother are my two main sources of support.
my wardrobe is all band tees.
I love going to farmer's markets with my friends because we can explore new foods and find fresh produce.
I love the challenge of a good fight, but I also enjoy the peace and quiet of practicing my flute.

content.text: Hi, I'm an artist who draws my friends as my little pony characters. What do you do for fun?
I like to dye my hair blue because it reminds me of the ocean. My dad and brother are my two main sources of support.
I'm glad you have a good support system. My daughter is my biggest inspiration. I love watching her grow and learn.
My family is pretty important to me too. I love going to farmer's markets with my friends and exploring new foods.
I don't get out much, but I love listening to music and spending time with my family. What do you like to do for fun?
I love the challenge of a good fight, but I also enjoy the peace and quiet of practicing my flute.
I'm not really a fighter, but I do enjoy the peace and quiet of painting.
I've never been much of an artist, but I can appreciate it.
Thanks! I'm glad you like my work.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it.
